oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Tennessean newspaper with article about CW veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Newspaper article entitled "New Blue Suits for the Gray Reunion" published in the Nashville Tennessean Sunday, May 20, 1934. Mr. W. W. Smith was the ancestor of the donor. Mr. Smith was from Mt. Juliet, Tenn. The newspaper article mentions that W.W. Smith; was in the 20th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, however, the only William Smith listed in that regiment died in 1862. Either the newspaper misprinted his regiment or he was left off of the roster of the 20th Tenn.
